text: The Forum of International Respiratory Societies is a respiratory health advocacy organization which consists of the following organizations: *The Asociacion Latinoamericana del Thorax *The American College of Chest Physicians *The American Thoracic Society *The Asian Pacific Society of Respirology *The European Respiratory Society *The International Union Against Tuberculosis and Lung Disease, and *The Pan African Thoracic Society. The Forum was established in 2002Global Surveillance, Prevention and Control of Chronic Respiratory Diseases: A Comprehensive Approach, page 133 and has more than 70,000 members worldwide. It is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.Website disclaimer In 2010, the Forum dubbed the year 2010 the "Year of the Lung".Organisers ==References== Category:Organizations established in 2002 Category:Organisations based in Lausanne Category:2002 establishments in Switzerland Category:Pulmonology and respiratory therapy organizations Category:International medical and health organizations
title: Forum of International Respiratory Societies
